explains: n. 赞助，赞助款；资助，倡议

sentences.en: Sport is being debased by commercial sponsorship.
sentences.cn: 体育运动因受商业赞助而降低了声誉。

sentences.en: Eventually, we alighted on the idea of seeking sponsorship.
sentences.cn: 最后我们偶然想到了寻求赞助。

sentences.en: Industrial sponsorship is a supplement to government funding.
sentences.cn: 工业界的赞助是对政府拨款的补充。
